# datePickerMode

**Instance Property**

The mode in use by the date picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var datePickerMode: NSDatePicker.Mode { get set }
```

## Discussion

For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDatePicker/Mode].
